title: BRIEF-Mowi Canada Announces Temporary Suspension Of 10 Licenses In Newfoundland, Canada
text:
BRIEF-Mowi Canada Announces Temporary Suspension Of 10 Licenses In Newfoundland, Canada

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 13, 2019 06:01)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Mowi Canada Announces Temporary Suspension Of 10 Licenses In Newfoundland, Canada Oct 13 (Reuters) - Mowi ASA : * REG-TEMPORARY SUSPENSION OF 10 LICENSES IN NEWFOUNDLAND, CANADA * MOWI CANADA- CO INFORMED THAT 10 LICENSES OUT OF CO'S 47 LICENSES IN NEWFOUNDLAND HAVE BEEN TEMPORARILY SUSPENDED * MOWI CANADA- SUSPENSION WILL TO CO'S KNOWLEDGE NOT IMPACT CO'S REMAINING OPERATIONS IN NEWFOUNDLAND * MOWI CANADA- NET ONE-OFF COSTS TO BE RECOGNIZED IN CO IN Q3 AMOUNTS TO ABOUT EUR 5 MILLION * MOWI CANADA- IMPACT ON MOWI'S HARVEST VOLUMES FOR 2019 EXPECTED TO BE REDUCTION OF ABOUT 1,000 TONNES GWT

BRIEF-Mowi Canada Announces Temporary Suspension Of 10 Licenses In Newfoundland, Canada
description: BRIEF-Mowi Canada Announces Temporary Suspension Of 10 Licenses In Newfoundland, Canada
